com.nsqre.insquare.Activities

Class BottomNavActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
          • com.nsqre.insquare.Activities.BottomNavActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, BottomSheetItemAdapter.BottomSheetItemListener

    public class BottomNavActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements BottomSheetItemAdapter.BottomSheetItemListener
    This is the main Activity for the app. It lets the user navigate through the several fragments of inSquare.

      • checkPlayServices

        private boolean checkPlayServices()
        Check the device to make sure it has the Google Play Services APK. If it doesn't, display a dialog that allows users to download the APK from the Google Play Store or enable it in the device's system settings.
